      • getDateFromString

        public static java.util.Date getDateFromString(java.lang.String str)
                                        throws java.text.ParseException
        Parse the string passed in and return the date object. The String has to be in INRIX Time format "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'". The time zone is UTC.
        Parameters:
        str - - Input date string
        Returns:
        - The converted date
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException

      • getStringFromDate

        public static java.lang.String getStringFromDate(java.util.Date date)
        Get the date string (required for INRIX server requests) from the date passed in
        Parameters:
        date - - the date to be converted to string
        Returns:
        - if date is null return null else the date passed in is formatted in "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'" format and returned
